metadata.dc:author: Urda Cardona, A
Acha García, T
Martínez Valverde, A
Baca Cost, M
metadata.dc:description: This article show our group of liver neoplasm. We studied the presentation way in the benign and malignant tumors. Moreover we compared the therapeutics results between both groups. In our population was more frequent the malignant neoplasm. The first symptom was more frequent the malignant neoplasm. The first symptom was abdominal mass but with more general complaints in the last one. We checked the increase survival with therapeutics as ADR or CDDP.
metadata.dc:title: Tumores hepáticos.
[Hepatic tumors].
